refreshed-advert:
The header shown above the footer advert
{{Identical|Advertisement}}
refreshed-action-addsection: The text for the Add Section action button
refreshed-explore: The text for the Explore button in the header
refreshed-icon-logged-in:
{{notranslate}}
URL to an icon that appears next to the user's username when the user is logged in; if not customized, which is the default, a smiling face is shown; if the SocialProfile extension is installed and configured for avatars, this message has no effect, and instead the appropriate SocialProfile icon is shown; compare to {{msg-mw|refreshed-icon-logged-out}}
refreshed-icon-logged-out:
{{notranslate}}
URL to an icon that appears next to the {{msg-mw|login}} message when the user is not logged in; if not customized, which is the default, a sleeping face is shown; if the SocialProfile extension is installed and configured for avatars, this message has no effect, and instead the appropriate SocialProfile icon is shown; compare to {{msg-mw|refreshed-icon-logged-in}}
refreshed-navigation:
{{notranslate}}
Navigational menus in Refreshed's header, following a similar format to {{msg-mw|Sidebar}}
refreshed-page-tools: Label for some page actions in the toolbox dropdown
refreshed-this-wiki-mobile-logo:
{{notranslate}}
URL to the mobile wordmark logo, if any
refreshed-this-wiki-url:
{{notranslate}}
URL to the wiki's main page or some other page where clicking the wiki wordmark should take the user to; if not customized, which is the default, the user is taken to the wiki's main page
refreshed-this-wiki-wordmark:
{{notranslate}}
URL to the wiki's wordmark logo (which should be 144x30px), because the Refreshed skin does not use [[mediawikiwiki:Manual:$wgLogo|$wgLogo]]
refreshed-user-tools: Label for some page user-related actions in the toolbox dropdown
refreshed-wiki-dropdown:
{{notranslate}}
Message for configuring the wiki dropdown menu.
The syntax is:
* Name of the wiki|URL to the wiki's logo|Wiki's URL
Entries are separated by newlines.
For example:
* English Wikipedia|http://www.example.com/images/wikipedia-wordmark-logo.svg|https://en.wikipedia.org
* Brickipedia|http://images.brickimedia.org/b/b4/Brickipedia.svg|http://en.brickimedia.org/
refreshed-wiki-tools: Label for some general site tools in the sidebar
